subject: Inquiry About Affiliate Payment - Simsonn
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope you're doing well.

My name is Alex Mai, and I'm an affiliate partner currently promoting
Simsonn products. It's been a great experience so far — the positive
feedback from users and the performance of the campaigns have truly
affirmed my belief in your brand.

As of now, I’ve earned $102,83 in affiliate commissions, and I would love
to inquire about the payment process. Specifically, could you kindly let me
know:

What is the minimum commission amount required for payout?

When are commissions typically processed and sent?

I’m committed to continuing my efforts in promoting Simsonn and
contributing to the brand’s visibility and success. I appreciate your
support and look forward to growing our partnership further.

Thank you in advance for your time and assistance.

Best regards,
Alex Mai

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Mai,     You can view the details at this link. https://www.simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program

Thank you so much for the great news!

Vào Th 2, 24 thg 11, 2025 vào lúc 09:54 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi Alex Mai,
>
> You can view the details at this link.
